welcome: Welcome to the Mortgage/Car Loan Calculator!
invalidMoney: Invalid input! Choose an amount between $1000 and $100000.
invalidYears: Invalid input! Choose between 1 and 25 years.
askAPR: What is the annual percentage rate?
askAmountMoney: What amount of money do you want to get loaned? ($10000 to $200000)
askYears: Choose the preferable duration of your loan (max. 25 years).
